name: Wizard Detective
description:
Wizard Detective is an experimental game about making friends with virtual people and detecting virtual wizards.

You are the Wizard Detective! An evil wizard is disguised as an ordinary person and only your Detect Magic Ritual can reveal who is under the power of evil magic. But to succeed, you'll need to make some friends.

Features:

  • Talk to virtual people about their virtual opinions and watch their relationships with one another evolve.
  • Everything is procedurally generated. Characters. Animations. Music. Buildings. Rocks...

Send feedback to evanmakesgames@gmail.com
